item.title: The Tale of the Old Man and His Son's Journey
item.description: The Tale of the Old Man and His Son’s Journey 🗒️ Description Story which teaches us that we should not judge events as good or bad, because life is full of surprises and it is difficult to predict their consequences.

item.title: Trust
item.description: Trust 🗒️ Description Trust that what happens to us is good. Don’t judge. Just trust that it is good. 🔗 Links [[LIFE/KNOWLEDGE/INFO/The Tale of the Old Man and His Son’s Journey|The Tale of the Old Man and His Son’s Journey]]

item.title: CEX
item.description: CEX 🗒️ Description Centralized exchanges (CEXs) allow users to buy and sell cryptocurrencies with fiat or other cryptocurrencies. Learn how they work in this article.

item.title: Gratitude
item.description: Gratitude 🗒️ Description It occurs that gratitude practice has many advantages and brings many positive effects to your life 🔗 Links The Neuroscience of Gratitude and Effects on the Brain

item.title: Physical activity
item.description: When to exercise? 🗒️ Description Physical exercises play a crucial role in maintaining overall health by improving cardiovascular function, strengthening bones and muscles, and reducing the risk of chronic diseases such as obesity, diabetes, and heart disease.

item.title: Cold shower
item.description: Cold shower 🗒️ Description Thera are a log of benefits that comes from taking cold showers. Making it my habit [[ABOUT/HABITS/Habits]] made a good influence on my life and performance.

item.title: Eisenhower Matrix
item.description: Eisenhower Matrix 🗒️ Description The Eisenhower Matrix is a great tool for organizing your tasks and helping you prioritize. It encourages you to focus on the most important things first, and it helps you break down large tasks into smaller, more manageable chunks.

item.title: Pareto
item.description: Pareto 🗒️ Description Pareto is a principle that states that 80% of outcomes come from 20% of the efforts. It’s commonly used in business to indicate that most results are generated by a small portion of work.
